member.name: SYNCMGRITEMFLAGS
member.summary: Specifies information for the current item in the structure.

member.name: SYNCMGRITEMFLAGS.SYNCMGRITEM_HASPROPERTIES
member.summary: The item has a properties dialog.

member.name: SYNCMGRITEMFLAGS.SYNCMGRITEM_TEMPORARY
member.summary: The item is temporary and any stored preferences can be removed. This value is defined but not used in Windows Vista.

member.name: SYNCMGRITEMFLAGS.SYNCMGRITEM_ROAMINGUSER
member.summary: The item roams with the user and is not specific to a machine. This value is defined but is ignored by both Windows XP and Windows Vista.

member.name: SYNCMGRITEMFLAGS.SYNCMGRITEM_MAYDELETEITEM
member.summary: The item may be deleted. This value has been deprecated for Windows Vista and later. This value is defined but is ignored by both Windows XP and Windows Vista.

member.name: SYNCMGRITEMFLAGS.SYNCMGRITEM_HIDDEN
member.summary: Windows Vista and later. Not supported.
